title: 6.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Update the given list of rankings. Start with the current ranking list as follows:


● Print the original ranking list.
● Update the rankings at the 2nd, 3rd, 6th, and 7th positions with the values 300, 450, 48,and 502, respectively. Note that the indexing starts from the 1st element.
● Print the updated ranking list.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
